route.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a way from one place to another
route.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We weren’t sure about which route we should take.
What’s the best route to Cambridge?
route.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a way between two places that buses, planes, ships etc regularly travel
route.translation[0].definitions[1].note: cycle route (=a way between two places that only people on bicycles can use)
route.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Is your office on a bus route?
route.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a way of doing something or achieving a particular result
route.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Kennedy arrived at the same conclusion by a different route.
route.translation[0].note_box[0].section: The motorway is the most direct route.
Let's look at the map and work out the best route.
We took the shortest route back to the hotel.
Sorry we're late. We took a rather circuitous route.
I decided to take the scenic route.
She followed the northerly route across Spain to Bilbao.
He had intended to return by the same route.
Is this a different route than the one we took before?
Holiday-makers bound for South Wales are advised to find an alternative route.
Check that your escape route is clear.
Are we following the right route?
They had been forced to take a longer route.
We studied the map and planned our route.
route.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to send something somewhere using a particular route
route.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: They had to route the goods through Germany.
route.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a way from one place to another, especially a way that is regularly used by a bus, plane, ship etc
route.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: What’s the best route to Cambridge?
The London-New York route is the busiest.
Is your office on a bus route?
route.translation[2].definitions[1].exam: We remained in Belgrade for a few hours en route to Montenegro.
route.translation[2].definitions[2].defi: a way of doing something or achieving a particular result
route.translation[2].definitions[2].exam: We believe the only route to continued success is to stay in touch with our customers.
route.translation[2].definitions[3].defi: used to show the number of a main road in the US
route.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: to send something or someone using a particular route
route.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: They had to route goods through Germany.
